li.label: Coventech Mechcommander Training
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} underwent Coventech training to perfectly hone their control of mechanoids, making them exceedingly adept at finely coordinating their mechs even unassisted by gear. {PAWN_pronoun} Is extremely susceptible to psychic phenomena.

li.label: Psychopath Training

li.label: Dark Warrior Training
